document.full_text: the u.s. and mexican governments on wednesday announced multimillion dollar rewards for information leading to the arrest and conviction of those responsible for the shooting of two u.s. immigration agents.
document.title: u.s. and mexico offer rewards over shooting of u.s. agents
lines_and_colors: the u.s. and mexican governments on wednesday announced multimillion dollar rewards for information leading to the arrest and conviction of those responsible for the shooting of two u.s. immigration agents.
